description.value: Choose a school of magic for which you have an affinity. Learn a cantrip of your choice from that school of magic. When you reach 3rd level, choose a 1st-ring spell from that same school of magic. You learn this spell and can cast it at its lowest ring. Once you cast this spell, you must finish a long rest before you can cast it again using this feature. Your spellcasting ability for these spells is CHA, INT, or WIS (choose which during character creation).
